evaluationCriteria.title: Evaluation Criteria
evaluationCriteria.description: We categorize brands into three levels based on their support of israel.

a.description: Israeli brands and all brands explicitly supporting israeli, such as Fiverr, Wix, Zara

b.description: Brands owned by giant corporations that support israeli, such as brands owned by Pepsico, Nestle, Coca Cola

c.description: Brands have business agreements with israel, such as HP, Intel, Microsoft

discord.description: Connect with others on the Discord server!

effectiveBoycotting.title: Effective Boycott
effectiveBoycotting.description: Without your participation, the boycott will have limited impact

a.title: Stop buying their products
a.p: Buy from their competitors or local alternatives

b.title: Promote others to take action
b.p: Motivate others to abbandon their products

c.title: Be active on social media
c.p: Unfollow their accounts, report their posts, and abstain from interacting with their content on social media

d.title: Lower their applications rating
d.p: Rate their apps with one star and leave a review showing their bias

q1.q: Are the boycotts against israel making an impact?
q1.a: Boycotts against Israel are having an impact, but they are just one part of the solution, not the whole solution.

q2.q: What are the benefits of the boycotting for local businesses and the economy?
q2.a: Boycotts can boost national economic growth, shift consumption patterns, and decrease unemployment by supporting local industries and small businesses. Additionally, boycotts can prompt businesses to negotiate, leading to policy changes and ethical behavior.

q3.q: Should we boycott all companies that support israel?
q3.a: Of course, the more companies we boycott, the more effective the boycott will be. However, it is not possible to boycott all companies, to make it easier for you, you can add them your boycott list.

easyAccess.title: Easy Access
easyAccess.description: Install on all platforms via the browser
